sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 520,307 damage to your primary target and 105,591 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 379 Versatility for 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 75 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Equip: The Core's unstable energies will randomly buff one of your secondary stats for 1,559. This lasts between 10 and 30 sec before randomly changing to another stat.

Use: Flip to the next section.

 (1 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: You are one of the devout. Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 1,949 Haste for 15 sec.

In addition, you grant another devout ally 390 Haste for 15 sec.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
